title: Sold: John Hummel Old Mill SGC-2 Low Pop Highest Graded

posts.post_title: Sold: John Hummel Old Mill SGC-2 Low Pop Highest Graded
posts.post_content:
Sold: Hummel Old Mill SGC-2
PayPal Goods or Certified check as payment, shipping included.

Highest Graded Example from either PSA or SGC. 
Extremely low pop with only 4 SGC and 3 PSA copies listed on the registries.
Last sales of PSA 1 examples at Heritage as follows:
May 2016: $3824, August 2020: $1500

Going to list here for one week before consigning.
Thanks
